name: Oliver Adams
body:
Hi there. I'm guessing you saw my talk at EMNLP. I'm a PhD student at The University of Melbourne under the supervision of Trevor Cohn, Steven Bird, and Graham Neubig (external). I'm aiming to wrap it up around halfway through 2017.

My publications can be found [here](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=s7wr1DsAAAAJ&hl=en) on Google Scholar.

When the wind blows, I may look something like this:

![](https://oadams.github.io/atm.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
